Discover the perfect blend of luxury and performance with this 2017 Mazda CX-5 AWD Grand Touring! This sleek, low-mileage SUV is designed for drivers who value premium features, comfort, and style in every drive. With its sophisticated design and Mazda's renowned handling, the CX-5 GT is ready for everything from city streets to weekend getaways.

 

Key Highlights:

160 Point Inspection on All Pre-Owned Inventory: Prioritize quality and reliability with our comprehensive 160-point inspection, guaranteeing that every aspect of the vehicle meets our stringent standards for your satisfaction.

One Owner Vehicle: Benefit from the confidence of owning a vehicle with a single owner, reflecting its well-maintained history and low wear and tear.

Fresh MVI (Motor Vehicle Inspection) on All Units: Drive with peace of mind knowing that this vehicle has undergone a fresh MVI, meeting all safety and performance standards to ensure your safety on the road.


Key Features:

2.5L SKYACTIV-G Engine: Powered by Mazda's 2.5L 4-cylinder SKYACTIV-G engine, producing 187 horsepower and 185 lb-ft of torque for a responsive and fuel-efficient drive. Combined with an automatic transmission, it delivers smooth acceleration and excellent fuel economy.

All-Wheel Drive (AWD): This CX-5 GT comes with Mazda's advanced AWD system for enhanced grip and stability, giving you confidence in all road conditions, including rain and snow.

Luxurious Interior: Enjoy premium materials, including leather-trimmed seats, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, and soft-touch surfaces that elevate the driving experience.

7-Inch Touchscreen Display with Mazda Connect: The intuitive 7-inch touchscreen is equipped with Mazda Connect infotainment, offering Bluetooth connectivity, satellite navigation, and a rearview camera for added convenience and safety.

Heated Front Seats & Power Driver's Seat: Stay comfortable in all seasons with heated front seats and an 8-way power-adjustable driver's seat with lumbar support, perfect for long drives and cold weather.

Advanced Safety Features: Drive confidently with Mazda's i-ACTIVSENSE safety suite, which includes Blind Spot Monitoring, Rear Cross Traffic Alert, Lane Departure Warning, and Smart City Brake Support for extra protection on every trip.





This 2017 Mazda CX-5 AWD Grand Touring is a perfect mix of luxury, performance, and practicality, making it an excellent choice for both city driving and outdoor adventures. With Mazda's reputation for precision engineering and a host of premium features, this SUV stands out from the crowd.
